name: Pesky Humans (itch)
description:
Humans have evolved and are destroying mother nature. Someone must stop them before it's too late!

Humans will chop down the first tree they see. With some wood, they will build houses that reproduce more humans periodically. You can plant back trees using your oxygen.  You can also destroy houses and humans using the lightning bolt.

You must destroy all humans and houses to win. If you lose all your oxygen and trees, you will lose.

This game was made for The HuJam in 72 hours. All assets used in the game were made by me during the jam. 

My team name : Maxwell

Thanks for playing.
